metadata.title: Carly Rae Jepsen Font - Create Text Graphics with E•MO•TION Font
metadata.description: Create text graphics with Carly Rae Jepsen's E•MO•TION album fonts. Use Colors Of Autumn and OPTIAlternateThree fonts to generate custom text graphics online.
metadata.keywords: carly rae jepsen font, emotion font, colors of autumn font, text generator, font generator, custom text graphics

hero.title: Carly Rae Jepsen Font
hero.subtitle: Create Text Graphics with E•MO•TION Font
hero.description: Generate beautiful text graphics using the same fonts from Carly Rae Jepsen's E•MO•TION album cover. Choose from Colors Of Autumn or OPTIAlternateThree fonts and customize with various effects.

about.title: About Carly Rae Jepsen Font
about.description1: is the third studio album by Carly Rae Jepsen. It was released on June 24, 2015 in Japan. To celebrate the album's tenth anniversary, it was re-released on October 17, 2025, and contains four additional songs.
about.description2: The E•MO•TION on the album cover used a brush script called Colors Of Autumn from JSH creates. The singer's name is a slightly modified version of Alternate Gothic No. 3 or OPTIFont's Alternate Gothic Three. The small text at the bottom used some version of Garamond.

howToUse.title: How To Use
howToUse.subtitle: Create your text graphics in just a few simple steps

step1.title: Enter Your Text
step1.description: Type the text you want to convert into a graphic. You can use up to 200 characters.

step2.title: Choose A Font
step2.description: Select from Colors Of Autumn (brush script) or OPTIAlternateThree (gothic style).

step3.title: Adjust Size & Color
step3.description: Use the slider to set the font size (5-300px) and pick your favorite colors.

step4.title: Add Effects
step4.description: Choose from various effects like gradients, shadows, or outlines to enhance your text.

step5.title: Download
step5.description: Click the download button to save your text graphic as a PNG image.

q1.question: What fonts are used on the E•MO•TION album cover?
q1.answer: The E•MO•TION text on the album cover uses Colors Of Autumn, a brush script font from JSH creates. Carly Rae Jepsen's name uses a slightly modified version of Alternate Gothic No. 3 or OPTIFont's Alternate Gothic Three. Small text elements use Garamond.

q2.question: What is the difference between Colors Of Autumn and OPTIAlternateThree?
q2.answer: Colors Of Autumn is a brush script font with a hand-drawn, artistic style perfect for the album title 'E•MO•TION'. OPTIAlternateThree is a condensed gothic font used for the singer's name, giving it a bold, modern look.

q3.question: Can I recreate the E•MO•TION album cover style?
q3.answer: Yes! Our generator uses the same fonts from the E•MO•TION album cover. You can create text graphics that match the album's aesthetic by using Colors Of Autumn for artistic text and OPTIAlternateThree for bold, condensed text.

q4.question: What colors work best with these fonts?
q4.answer: The E•MO•TION album uses a vibrant color palette. You can experiment with gradients, bright colors, or pastels to match the album's aesthetic. The generator supports full color customization.

q5.question: Can I use this for fan art or social media posts?
q5.answer: Yes! Our generator is perfect for creating fan art, social media posts, and creative projects inspired by Carly Rae Jepsen's E•MO•TION album. Download your creations as high-quality PNG images.

q6.question: Is this officially affiliated with Carly Rae Jepsen?
q6.answer: No, this is a fan-made tool that uses fonts similar to those on the E•MO•TION album cover. We are not affiliated with Carly Rae Jepsen or her record label. Please respect trademark rights for commercial use.
